## API

### props

| props    | type     | required | default       | description                                                         |
| -------- | -------- | -------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| position | `String` |          | `"top-right"` |                                                                     |
| maxWidth | `Number` |          | `100`         | The maximum length of the scale control in pixels.                  |
| unit     | `String` |          | `'metric'`    | Unit of the distance ( `'imperial'` , `'metric'` or `'nautical'` ). |
